mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.email FROM member m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, MAX(logindate) AS last_login FROM login_history GROUP BY id ) lh ON m.id = lh.id WHERE (lh.last_login IS NULL OR lh.last_login < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) AND m.active = 'ON'
SELECT logindate FROM login_history WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY logindate DESC
